title: Instructional Design for Enhancing Employee Cohesion and Learning Relationships in the Workplace

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: An educational program focused on strengthening cohesion and building learning relationships among working professionals in online environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three key factors (shared goals, mutual support, etc.) influencing cohesion formation in workplace environments.
Learners can assess the impact of cohesion on workplace learning effectiveness through case analysis and propose improvement strategies.
Learners can execute cohesion-enhancing strategies in team projects using online collaboration tools and submit results in report form.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
